SEARCH

Unnamed Package

  • Class
    Description
    Action
    An abstract class representing an action that can be performed in a battle.
    AdrenalSurge
    A gambit that heals the bearer for 10 HP and boosts their damage for 2 turns.
    AdvancedTrainingDummy
    AdvancedTrainingDummy is a Champion that serves as a training dummy for players to practice against.
    Arsenal
    A Champion's arsenal is a collection of BattleModifiers that can be used during a battle.
    BattleContext
    The current battle context in which a BattleModifier is being employed.
    BattleEngine
    The BattleEngine class is responsible for managing the battle between two champions.
    BattleLog
    The battle log records the actions taken during a battle.
    BattleLog.Entry
    The Entry class represents a single entry in the battle log.
    BattleLog.EntryType
    The EntryType enum represents the different types of entries that can be recorded in the battle log.
    BattleModifier
    An abstract class representing a battle modifier that can be applied to a character in a battle.
    Champion
    A Champion is a player's character in the game.
    ChampionController
    The ChampionController interface defines the methods for player interactions in the Champions Arena game.
    ChampionsArena
    The ChampionsArena class is the entry point for the Champions Arena game.
    Chargebreaker
    A tactic that increases damage dealt to an opponent if they are charging.
    ConsoleChampionController
    The ConsoleChampionController class implements the ChampionController interface for a console-based version of the Champions Arena game.
    DynamicClassLoader
    DynamicClassLoader is a utility class that loads classes from a specified directory.
    EmberCrystal
    A relic that increases damage dealt to an opponent.
    Gambit
    A Gambit is a special type of BattleModifier that can be activated by the player.
    GuiChampionController
    The GuiChampionController class implements the ChampionController interface for a graphical user interface (GUI) version of the Champions Arena game.
    LastLight
    A tactic that doubles healing when the champion's health is below 25%.
    Loadout
    A champion's loadout, which includes a tactic, a relic, and a pocketed gambit, and any temporary modifiers that are active.
    ModifierVault
    A vault of battle modifiers that can be drawn randomly throughout the match.
    RecklessBurst
    A gambit that increases damage dealt to an opponent but reduces the wielder's defense for 2 turns.
    Relic
    A Relic is a special type of BattleModifier that is always in effect when it is equipped.
    StoneAmulet
    A relic that reduces all incoming damage by 2.
    Tactic
    A Tactic is a special type of BattleModifier that that a player adds to their loadout.
    TemporaryModifier
    A temporary battle modifier that can be applied by an action to allow effects to be applied to a character that normally could not be applied by an action, such as shielding.
    TrainingDummy
    The TrainingDummy class represents a champion that serves as a training dummy for players to practice against.
    TurnSubmission
    A class that encapsulates the player's choices during their turn in the game.
    WebChampionController
    The WebChampionController class implements the ChampionController interface for a web-based version of the Champions Arena game.
